summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting an interview with a female witness (name redacted) conducted on September 18, 2019, in New York. The witness details her introduction to Jeffrey Epstein, her travels to his properties, interactions with Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and others, and describes sexual assaults by Epstein. She also mentions bringing her underage sister into Epstein's orbit.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the interview; the witness describes meeting him, traveling to his properties, receiving career advice from him, and being sexually assaulted by him during massages.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as encouraging the witness and her sister to be more sexual, acting as a 'ringleader for girls,' and having conversations about sexuality. The witness interacted with her in Palm Beach, New York, and New Mexico.

persons.name: Blaine
persons.role: Associate who introduced witness to Epstein
persons.context: Introduced the witness to Jeffrey Epstein at a New York nightclub in 2004 and took her to Epstein's New York mansion. The witness categorized him as one of the 'weird creepy slimeballs' but the 'nicest one.'

persons.name: Naomi Campbell
persons.context: Was present at a dinner at Epstein's New York mansion when the witness first met Epstein.

persons.name: Ron
persons.context: Mentioned by the witness as someone she met, but she could not recall if it was before or after meeting Epstein.

persons.name: Kellen
persons.context: Would tell the witness what time Epstein wanted a massage.

persons.name: Les Wexner
persons.context: The witness was told by an individual named 'Sarah' that Epstein earned all his money from having sex with Les Wexner.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The witness was told by 'Sarah' that Epstein and Prince Andrew would fly on Epstein's plane and have orgies.

persons.name: Sarah
persons.context: Described by the witness as quiet and giving the 'vibe' of being Epstein's main girlfriend. The witness interacted with her on the island and in Palm Beach. 'Sarah' made negative comments about Epstein to the witness.

persons.name: David Copperfield
persons.context: The witness and her sister met and talked with David Copperfield in Las Vegas, leading her to believe he and Epstein were friends.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Present during the FBI interview of the witness.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: Present during the FBI interview of the witness.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Present during the FBI interview of the witness.

connections.description: Witness could not figure out their relationship but thought they were friends. Maxwell acted as a 'ringleader for girls' and encouraged them to be sexual around Epstein.
Blaine introduced the witness to Epstein and facilitated her initial visit to Epstein's New York mansion.
Witness perceived Sarah as Epstein's 'main girlfriend.' Sarah also made negative comments about Epstein to the witness.
Witness was told by Sarah that Epstein earned all his money from having sex with Les Wexner.
Witness was told by Sarah that Epstein and Prince Andrew would fly on Epstein's plane and have orgies.
Witness met Copperfield with Epstein present and inferred they were friends.
Both were present with Epstein and the witness on multiple occasions, including on the private island and in Palm Beach.
Epstein sexually assaulted the witness during massages, groped her, and acted as a mentor figure while exploiting her.
Maxwell encouraged the witness and her sister to be more sexual, had conversations with them about sexuality, and socialized with them (e.g., horseback riding, hot tub).

events.title: Witness meets Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The witness, approximately 18 years old, is introduced to Jeffrey Epstein by Blaine at a New York nightclub and later attends a dinner at Epstein's New York mansion where Naomi Campbell is present.

events.title: New Year's trip to Epstein's private island
events.description: The witness is contacted to go to Epstein's private island for New Year's. She travels there, meets Sarah and others, and this marks the beginning of her repeated visits to Epstein's properties.

events.title: Sexual assaults during massages
events.description: Epstein sexually assaults the witness during massages, which occurred multiple times. He would grope her and the assaults began after he encouraged her to become a masseuse.

events.title: Trip to New Mexico with underage sister
events.description: The witness and her underage sister meet Epstein in Las Vegas and fly on his jet to New Mexico. Ghislaine Maxwell encourages them to be more sexual. Another woman implies the sister was brought for Epstein's purposes.

events.title: FBI interview of witness
events.description: The witness is interviewed by the FBI, with an AUSA, a detective, and a special agent present, regarding her experiences with Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 6300 Wilshire Blvd, Suite 1500, Los Angeles, California (interview location)
New York, New York (location of interview and Epstein's mansion)
Upper East Side, New York (apartment owned by Epstein)
Miami, Florida (mentioned in relation to Sarah's husband)
keyFacts: The witness describes being sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein multiple times during massages, which began after he encouraged her to train as a masseuse.

The witness brought her underage sister to Epstein's properties in New Mexico after informing Epstein of her sister's age, and another woman implied the sister was brought for Epstein's sexual purposes.
Ghislaine Maxwell is described as actively encouraging the witness and her sister to be more sexual and acting as a 'ringleader for girls' to make them comfortable discussing sexual topics.

The witness was told by an associate named 'Sarah' that Epstein earned his money from a sexual relationship with billionaire Les Wexner and that Epstein and Prince Andrew had orgies on Epstein's plane.

The witness's interactions with Epstein's network lasted over a year and included travel to his properties in New York, Palm Beach, his private island, and New Mexico, often facilitated by his associates.
